synopsis.text:
Realizing her dream of becoming an Olympic figure skater is on thin ice, 16-year-old Tazusa Sakurano faces a unique challenge when a Canadian ghost, Pete Pumps, takes up residence in her body. Tazusa, who confidently values her beauty at $10 billion, struggles to maintain her composure after a series of falls during crucial competitions. As the media scrutinizes her every move, she finds herself in a peculiar situation when Pete's spirit enters her life following a tragic accident.

Initially frustrated by the invasion of privacy and the constant voice in her head, Tazusa begins to accept her new reality. With Pete's presence intensifying every sensation she experiences, the duo works together to improve Tazusa's skating skills. As they navigate the complexities of their shared existence, Tazusa and Pete strive to help her regain her footing on the ice and secure a spot in the Olympics.

Faced with an extraordinary situation, Tazusa must learn to trust her unlikely companion and embrace the unique blend of humor, chaos, and determination that defines their partnership. As they work towards their common goal, the pair discovers that sometimes, it takes more than just talent to achieve greatness.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
